home.history_of_entrecote_cafe_de_paris: History of Entrecote Cafe de Paris
home.history_paragraph_1: Our story started in 1930 in Geneva, Switzerland at a restaurant called “Café de Paris” on 26 Rue Mont Blanc where the patron Chef Boubier in 1930 developed the world-famous sauce “Café de Paris” named after his restaurant and its recipe is still kept a top secret till today
home.our_formula_paragraph_1: Served with Green Salad and French fries with your choice of Entrecote steaks with Cafe de Paris sauce

branch-page.alfaisaliah-paragraph-1: Our story started in 1930 in Geneva, Switzerland at a restaurant called “Café de Paris” on 26 Rue Mont Blanc where the patron Chef Boubier in 1930 developed the world-famous sauce “Café de Paris” named after his restaurant and its recipe is still kept a top secret till today.
branch-page.alfaisaliah-paragraph-2: In 1942, Chef Boubier gifted his secret recipe to his daughter and her husband the new owners of “Café de Paris” restaurant who came up with the idea of offering a Single Menu Formula consisting of a Green Salad, 200 grams of Entrecôte Steak with “Café de Paris” sauce and homemade French Fries. This simple formula gained immediate worldwide fame and success. Many restaurateurs around the world tried to imitate our set formula and our “Café de Paris” sauce but never equaled our distinctive taste and texture which explains our motto “Toujours Imitée, Jamais Egalée”.

reservation-page.our-commitment-to-your-safety-during-cov: Our commitment to your safety during COVID-19
reservation-page.i-certify-i-am-above-the-age-of-13: I certify I am above the age of 13
reservation-page.receive-news-and-offers-for-all-our-loca: Receive news and offers for all our locations
reservation-page.i-agree-our-terms-and-conditions: I agree our terms and conditions
reservation-page.by-clicking-submit-you-agree-to: By clicking submit you agree to

policy.child-policy-paragraph-1: In order to maintain a serene and pleasant environment for all guests during evening hours, we kindly request that children under the age of 7 do not enter the restaurant after 8:00 PM.
policy.reservation-guidelines-paragraph-1: We kindly ask that you arrive on time to ensure a seamless reservation experience and accommodate all guests effectively.
policy.reservation-guidelines-paragraph-2: Any delay exceeding 15 minutes may result in the cancellation of your reservation.
policy.reservation-guidelines-paragraph-3: The duration of a table reservation is set at 90 minutes, allowing us to manage bookings efficiently and provide a delightful experience for all guests.
policy.food-and-beverage-regulations-paragraph-: To uphold the quality and safety standards of our establishment, we kindly request that no outside food or beverages be brought into the restaurant.
policy.dress-code-paragraph-1: To maintain an elegant atmosphere, we kindly ask that guests refrain from wearing shorts while dining in our restaurant.
policy.dress-code-paragraph-2: We appreciate your adherence to our dress code, as it contributes to the overall ambiance and enhances the experience for all visitors.
policy.we-greatly-value-your-understanding-para: We greatly value your understanding and cooperation regarding our policies. It is our sincere aim to offer you an exceptional and unforgettable experience at Entrecote Cafe De Paris Restaurant.
